casebody.data:
William HAVENS, Petitioner
v.
WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CNA FINANCIAL CORPORATION), Respondent William Havens, Petitioner
v.
Workers' Compensation Appeal Board (CNA Financial Corporation), Respondent No. 151 MAL 2018
No. 152 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. August 7, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 7th day of August, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
